document_data.mainbody:
rapmasters hoods were a type of enchanted thieves headwear, in the 15 century DR.
These hoods possessed magics that enhanced the wearers sight, allowing them to see the most intricate details of any traps or locks, resulting in drastic improvements of their thieving and roguish skills.
In the 15 century DR, trapmasters hoods could be found among various inhabitants of the Sword Mountains, areas surrounding the city of Neverwinter, its markets, and the ancient ruins of Illefarn.
